main.name: I'm Ahmed Abdelhamid
main.description: A .Net Full Stack Developer that looking out for a professional growth in Microsoft .Net Technology in an IT organization, where I can contribute to its successful growth using my abilities and experience and further improve my personal and professional skills
main.bio: I am an athlete at heart, with an entrepreneurial spirit, a knack for software developing, and a passion for coding. After working as a Network Engineer, I started feeling my passion for software developing when faced with very limited time and a lot of routine work so I started researching for ways to help myself and my team to be more productive and developed a software to automate a lot of the manual work we have been doing. Then I decided to quit my job to purse my passion to be a software developer and started learning web developing while working as a freelancer on a project for premium ranks, Australia. in April 2021 I finished studying web developing using Microsoft .Net Technology and still work as a freelancer in upwork while pursuing my ideas and working on projects of my own.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

responsibilities: Developing a software to pull all the required companies info from Google, Yellow pages and Hipages for the marketing campaigns.
Developing a software for the data analysis.
Developing a software to record the info from the sales teams.
achievements:
Developing a software that pulled more than 120,000 company
records, analyse the data for the targeted marketing sending ads to all their emails and record all the info from the sales teams.
description.intro: Working on a project to automate most of the work done by the sales and marketing teams

responsibilities: The sole responsible of project planning, research and development of the RPA software (as it was my idea).
achievements: Developing 5 RPA projects that can generate scripts, configure & test switches, collect data and generate a complete Database which results in speeding up the process up to 5 times and keeping the error to the absolute minimum.
description.intro: Configuring the network in the Kayan ElAskry project while developing RPA software to replace most of the team routinely work.
